originalText.text: There’s a rodent problem in the entire building, they need a new accountant to understand the value of a rent receipt. The property is not in good standing when it comes to cleanliness. If you do move in the property be sure to love cats because you’re going to need one or two! I’m not a cat lover or cat litter box person. Otherwise the rodent problem and the rent receipts issue. All the tenants and kids and friends loitering outside the building all night long-standing around doing nothing! Move in at your own risk!

originalText.text: I applied for an appartment and gave it to there main office and they lost our paperwork. No one was able to explain how this happened properly and they stated they were being audited so it was chaos but they will keep searching. Of course when I called again to get an update they acted as though they never spoken to me. And said I need to apply again and wait another 3 years (mind you I already waited 3 years) I love this area and the apartments are but there staff is Horrible.

originalText.text: I don't know where those other positive review came from, but I live in that building and there is no one that is happy about this location. There are issues with the renovations they are and were improperly done and are of poor quality, there are problems with the rent receipts where the improper rents are on the receipts and they are taking all of the people in the building to landlord-tenant court for these bad rent receipts, these are fact that can be verified by going to 100 center street and looking up cannaan llc Inc vers and see that there are 90 tenants in court as of 5/20/2018 and since there are only 147 unit in the building that means there is more than half of the tenant in court which is unheard of. Several of the people in the building have had to move out because of the constant harassment by the management and the terrible maintenance staff which don't keep the building clean and don't want to work. the management also changes the rule without notice and or reason living may of the tenant very unhappy and currently seeking legal remedies. So this building is a mess don't get yourself caught up in this horrible situation.

originalText.text: Harlem Canaan house incorporated which is ran by hope community is trying to Chase off all of their tenets.  They have more than 20 apartments available but they keep lying to everyone and telling them that there are no apartments available So if you don't look like you have a certain amount of money they're not going to rent an apartment to you. This is a Hud building but they lie and say that it is not Under Hud, They Also lied to the state to get money to fix the building up which they didn't but they did raise the rent. More than 70% of this building is currently in court Right now for suppose it missing rent Going as far back as 2013 And quite a few people lost and in result lost their homes ergo why there are vacant apartments in the building that are not being rented. Canaan house is a subsidiary or an Unbrella  corporation of hope community That is supposed to be A non for profit organization that is making lots of profit by throwing people out of their homes and tried to put rich people In their Place.
